channel.title: Workspaces on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in Workspaces on Today I Learned

item.description: That you can add a [workspace.dependencies] table in your top-level Cargo.toml specifying paths to internal crates: # ${PROJECT_DIR}/Cargo.toml [workspace] members = ["path/to/my_crate"] [workspace.dependencies] my_crate = { path = "path/to/my_crate" } # ${PROJECT_DIR}/path/to/other_crate/Cargo.toml [dependencies] my_crate = { workspace = true} See https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/workspaces.html#the-dependencies-table. See also https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/workspaces.html. workspace = true can also help share external dependencies within multiple internal crates; see https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/specifying-dependencies.html#inheriting-a-dependency-from-a-workspace.
